abstract: Afghanistan's central bank claims that employees at branch in Kandahar stole $1.4 million from the bank.
lead_paragraph: Employees at a branch of Afghanistan’s central bank in Kandahar Province might have got away with as much as $1.4 million when they robbed their own bank, an official said Saturday.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Bank Workers Looted Bank, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Bank Workers Looted Bank, Official Says
